# Rope of Entanglement
## Overview
**Aura** strong transmutation; **CL** 12th

**Slot** â€”

**Price** 21,000 gp

**Weight** 5 lbs.

**Description**

A *rope of entanglement* looks just like any other hempen rope about 30 feet long. Upon command, the rope lashes forward 20 feet or upward 10 feet to entangle a victim. An [[Entangled|entangled]] creature can break free with a DC 20 Strength check or a DC 20 [[Escape Artist (Skill)|Escape Artist]] check.

A *rope of entanglement* has AC 22, 12 hit points, hardness 10, and damage reduction 5/slashing. The rope repairs damage to itself at a rate of 1 point per 5 minutes, but if a rope of entanglement is severed (all 12 hit points lost to damage), it is destroyed.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Animate Objects (Spell)|animate objects]], [[Animate Rope (Spell)|animate rope]]* or *[[Entangle (Spell)|entangle]]*

**Cost** 10,500 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 529
